divs: Sighting Detailsi was going home on my bike and i saw a star like thingie and i thought it was too early to see any stars now. it diddent do anything but just hover verry high off the ground thats why i thought it was a star. i first noticed it because my houes was on a slope and i was riding twards it and it was maby just above my home but it seemed like it was verry far away. i dident see any detales because it looked like a bright light. when i first saw it i just looked at it because it was a bright light and it was still light out so i looked at it for about a 3 secconds and it flashed and dissapered. i lost sight of it because i saw nothing but a large flash like i just got a picture taken.
Summary: a star thingie like a circle and a flash
